Text: hey... thank you so much for sharing :) ... does this mean you're going to upload the rest of the seasons too?... would be great, 'cause the YT clips were taken down (only the fan vids are still on), didn't save them on time and I would really like to have the full Willow-Tara story...

Yes, I'm planning to do so :) I've finished creating massive video #2 (for Season 5) and I plan to upload that someday soon. Want to seed this a little while longer first though. 
I'm currently also working on the vid for Season 6 so keep your eyes open for those.
